entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Port Perry
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:46 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Uxbridge 10:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: NNE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle mixed with ice pellets at times mixed with light snow early this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
